description: Takes brand names (pasted as text or from CSV), researches each brand on the web with a Turkey-first methodology to collect: official website (Turkey site preferred, global fallback), logo URL, founded year, about page link, product categories, social media links, contact info. Returns structured data with verification confidence levels.

brands.website_url: Selected official website URL (Turkey preferred) or Not Found
brands.confidence: Verified, Partially Verified, or Not Found
brands.logo_url: Direct image URL of brand logo or Not Found
brands.founded_year: Year founded if stated on official site, or Not Found
brands.about_summary: 2-3 sentence about us summary or Not Found
brands.about_page_link: Full URL of about page or Not Found
brands.product_category: Comma-separated product categories from site navigation or Not Found

social_media.twitter: Twitter/X profile URL or Not Found
social_media.linkedin: LinkedIn page URL or Not Found
social_media.instagram: Instagram profile URL or Not Found
social_media.facebook: Facebook page URL or Not Found
social_media.youtube: YouTube channel URL or Not Found
social_media.tiktok: TikTok profile URL or Not Found
social_media.pinterest: Pinterest profile URL or Not Found

contact_info.email: Primary contact email or Not Found
contact_info.phone: Primary phone number or Not Found

brands.status: Complete if all fields found, Partial if some Not Found
